name: Rebel Fish / Pez rebelde
description:
From the Imaginary Fish series.
I remember that as a child I wanted to spike my hair but it didn't work out very well because of my hair type. Or maybe I just wasn't using enough gel. Or maybe my mother didn't want me to do it and didn't help me enough. Some years later I did it. In hindsight I looked ridiculous, but the important thing was not the appearance but the defiance.

De la serie Peces imaginarios.
Recuerdo que de niño yo quería peinarme con picos pero no me salía muy bien por mi tipo de pelo. O quizá sólo no usaba suficiente gel. O tal vez mi madre no quería que lo hiciera y no me ayudó lo suficiente. Ya más grande lo logré. En retrospectiva me veía ridículo, pero lo importante no era la apariencia sino la rebeldía.

1920x1080

2022
